Actions.Name: Add a recipient as a subscriber
Actions.Description: Adds a recipient as a subscriber and returns their unique subscription url

Actions.Name: Remove a recipient as a subscriber
Actions.Description: Removes a recipient as a subscriber.

Actions.Name: Send a notification to many recipients
Actions.Description: Send a notification to all recipients in a specific category

Actions.Name: Send notification to recipient
Actions.Description: Send a defined browser notification to an individual recipient
